items.title: US cuts visa validity for most Nigerian applicants
items.description: The United States announces sweeping changes to its non-immigrant visa policy for Nigeria.

items.title: Red Bull sack team principal Horner after 20 years
items.description: Christian Horner is sacked as Red Bull team principal after 20 years in the role.

items.title: China rejects German claim it targeted military plane with laser
items.description: Germany says a laser fired by a Chinese warship tried to disrupt a reconnaissance plane over the Red Sea.

items.title: Ukraine suffers heaviest attack as Trump criticises Putin
items.description: The US president reverses a suspension of weapons shipments to Kyiv and heavily criticises Russia's Putin.

items.title: Steve Rosenberg: Moscow shrugs off Trump's irritation with Putin
items.description: But the US president's words have not gone unnoticed, writes the BBC's Russia Editor.
